RESUME
AVINASH KATOCH
Vill-Makol, Palampur, Kangra - 176076, H.P, India

Contact: +918374469079, +919882626143.
Post applied for: - Structural Engineer.
Mechanical Engineer with 4.5 Year Experience.
OBJECTIVE
To secure a challenging position in an esteemed organization. Where my 
capabilities can be utilized for the growth of organization and ample scope 
obtained for my careers growth. To use the knowledge, experience and skill 
acquired, to learn and adopt new and emerging technologies.
HIGHLIGHT
A person who is eager, enthusiastic and determined. Able to examine a 
complicated problem in all aspects in a cool, detached and systematic manner 
and pin out the critical areas. Confident and ready to shoulder new 
responsibility.
JOB PROFILE
Fabrication & Erection of all Structural such as (Column, Truss, Electrical Rack, 
conveyer, duct, pipe racks & pipe support),Monitoring daily activities on day to 
day basis and meeting targets of construction schedule, Well versed with 
Safety Procedures at Worksites to maintain “Accident Free Site”. Manpower 
handling, motivating them along guidance related safety. To co-ordinate for 
shut down activities of off- plot and on plot tie in piping works include shut 
down plan preparation, manpower, machinery, shutdown materials, and 
equipment estimation, coordination for the permit to work procedure with 
client, coordination for the site preparation etc.
Various alignment involved in coordinating with planning, quality control and 
safety members regarding the works. Coordination & planning with piping 
execution department for necessary structure requirement as per layout. 
Coordinate with client / company for necessary raw material requirement & 
make MIV.
